title: Real Madrid v Marseille, Juventus v Dortmund, and more: Champions League – live
summary: Rob Smyth covers the opening night of the league stage, providing updates on all the goals and the latest news. Fans can follow his insights and analysis as the action unfolds. Stay tuned for real-time information on the games.

title: Tottenham v Villarreal: Champions League – live
summary: The Europa League holders are making their return to the tournament in North London. Scott Murray will provide a minute-by-minute report on the match. Fans can look forward to an exciting update as the action unfolds.

title: Charlie Kirk murder suspect left note on shooting to roommate, authorities say as charges revealed – live updates
summary: Tyler Robinson has been charged with seven counts, including aggravated murder. He will remain in custody without bail as the prosecution seeks the death penalty. The case has garnered significant attention in Utah.

title: Trump has fanned the flames of divisive politics around the world, says Sadiq Khan
summary: London Mayor Sadiq Khan criticized US President Joe Biden, claiming he has significantly contributed to the rise of far-right movements. Khan's remarks suggest that Biden's policies and rhetoric may have emboldened extremist ideologies. The statement highlights concerns about political leadership and its impact on global extremism.

title: Donald Trump lands in UK for second state visit as protesters gather in Windsor
summary: The US president is set to arrive on Tuesday for a lavish program in the UK. London Mayor Sadiq Khan urges UK leaders to openly critique the visit. The call for candid discussions highlights the significance of the diplomatic engagement.
